content.question: Which of the following explains the difference between short-run and long-run costs?

choices.label: All costs are variable in the short run but not in the long run.
All costs are fixed in the long run but not in the short run.
All costs are variable in the long run but not in the short run.
All costs are fixed in the short run but not in the long run.
All costs are variable in the short run and fixed in the long run.

content.answer: All costs are variable in the long run but not in the short run.
